elements.name: Shipper create an order via API

steps.name: the shipper is registered in Ninja Van
shipper authenticate to ninja van System
QA verifies that the HTTP authentication response code is '200'
shipper send order create request and shipper provide the access token in the request header
QA verifies that the HTTP order creation  response code is '200'
